### Line column chart

<div class="row">

<!-- First column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">

```{r line_column_code, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Loading required packages
library(unhcrthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)

# Loading data
df <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/change_over_time/line_column.csv")

# Plot
ggplot(data = df) +
  geom_col(aes(year,
               displaced_population, fill = "Displaced population"),
           width = 0.7) +
  geom_line(aes(year,
                displaced_proportion * 10, color = "Proportion displaced"),
            size = 1) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = setNames(unhcr_pal(n = 1, "pal_blue"),
                                      "Displaced population")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = setNames(unhcr_pal(n = 1, "pal_red"),
                                       "Proportion displaced")) +
  labs(title = "Trend of global displacement | 2007 - 2016",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder
© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = pretty_breaks(n = nrow(df))) +
  scale_y_continuous("Displaced population (millions)",
                     expand = expansion(c(0, 0.2)),
                     breaks = pretty_breaks(),
                     sec.axis = sec_axis(~ . / 10,
                                         breaks = pretty_breaks(),
                                         name = "Proportion displaced (number displaced per 1,000)")) +
  theme_unhcr(grid = "Y", axis_title = "y")
```

</div>
<!-- End First column --->
